TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ServiceNameCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase

Docs.summary: The ServiceNameCollection class is a read-only collection of service principal names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ServiceNameCollection class is used in an <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> when validating against a custom list of service provider names (SPNs).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection items) cil managed

Docs.param: An instance of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> class that contains the specified values of service names to be used to initialize the class.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new read-only instance of the class based on an existing <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> class that is initialized contains the specified values passed in the `items` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(string searchServiceName) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the specified string occurs within this instance.
Docs.returns:
Returns <xref:System.Boolean>.
if the parameter occurs within this instance; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection Merge(class System.Collections.IEnumerable serviceNames) cil managed

Docs.param: An instance of the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> class that contains the specified values of service names to be merged.
Docs.summary: Merges the current with the specified values to create a new containing the union.
Docs.returns: A new instance that contains the union of the existing instance merged with the specified values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> class that is initialized contains the specified values passed in the `items` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection Merge(string serviceName) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that contains the specified values of service names to be used to initialize the class.
Docs.summary: Merges the current with the specified values to create a new containing the union.
Docs.returns: A new instance that contains the union of the existing instance merged with the specified values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ServiceNameCollection> class that is initialized contains the specified values passed in the `items` parameter.
